document.full_text: dozens of saudis gathered outside the interior ministry in riyadh on sunday to demand the release of jailed relatives, activists said, two days after a planned day of protests fizzled amid a heavy police presence.
document.title: dozens of saudis gather at protest in riyadh
lines_and_colors: dozens of saudis gathered outside the interior ministry in riyadh on sunday to demand the release of jailed relatives, activists said, two days after a planned day of protests fizzled amid a heavy police presence.
